description: Try our easy to follow Mini Orange Shortbreads recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mini Orange Shortbreads Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 175g unsalted butter, cut into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Place the flour in a bowl, add the butter and rub in with the finger tips until the mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs. Stir in the remaining ingredients with the measurement water and mix to form a dough.
Roll out the dough on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of 2.5 mm. Using a 1.5 cm plain cutter, cut out about 80 rounds.
Place the rounds on nonstick baking sheets and bake in a preheated oven, 200°C for 10-12 minutes until golden. Carefully transfer to a wire rack to cool.
Mix together the icing sugar and cocoa powder and dust a little over the shortbreads before serving.
